attributes.action: I propose that Aspartame should be banded in all commercial drinks.
attributes.additional_details: Aspartame should be banded in all commercial drinks until it can be proven to be safe.
attributes.background: Aspartame consumed by mothers during pregnancy or breastfeeding may be associated with autism in their male children, according to a study led by researchers at the University of Texas Health Science Center at San Antonio (UT Health San Antonio).

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for the same action:

Ban artificial sweeteners from food and drink products:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/636698
